name: Owl Bird Survival Simulator 3D Free
description:
Fly like a bird with this owl simulator!

Try Owl Bird Survival Simulator 3D! Survive against other animals, hunt fish and mice and explore wilderness. Take control of a huge owl bird, hunt to earn bonuses and upgrade owl's survival skills with Owl Bird Survival Simulator 3D! Choose your lifestyle - hide in bushes or battle against other animals! Fly high and hunt each bird to survive!

Great owl simulator for those who loves animals! Fly as a bird to explore wildreness and hunt with this survival simulator! Hunt for food, battle against other animals and enjoy being an owl!

Owl Bird Survival Simulator 3D features:

Great owl simulator
Hunt for small animals to survive
Fly into the wilderness
Survive against other animals

Live the life as a bird with Owl Bird Survival Simulator 3D! Survive agains other animals, fly high, hunt and have fun with this survival simulator! Survive at any price! Try Owl Bird Survival Simulator 3D!
